## 

![Photo of 92NY logo with pictures of guests.
                                           ](/assets/media/images/content/hero/92ny_2025hero.jpg
                                           ) 

## 

New Season

Go inside one of NYC's most beloved cultural institutions and experience a variety of world renowned "talks" with featured guests from film, television, literature, art and much more.

New Season Premiering September 20th at 8pm on NYC Life

![Inside Power Station logo with microphones.
                                           ](/assets/media/images/content/hero/inside_power_station_hero.jpg
                                           ) 

## 

It's the legendary NYC recording studio where Bruno Mars, Lady Gaga, Herbie Hancock and Tony Bennett have all recorded iconic albums.

Tune in Fridays at 9pm on NYC Life

![Photo of Walking NYC with host Tom Delgado with text Take a Step into NYC History, All from the comfort of your couch.
                                           ](/assets/media/images/content/hero/walkin_nyc_hero1.jpg
                                           ) 

## 

New Show

Join licensed tour guide, historian and comedian, Tom Delgado, as he explores the city's most fascinating neighborhoods.

Tune in Tuesdays at 8pm on NYC Life

![The NYC Field Guide logo image
                                           ](/assets/media/images/content/hero/nyc_field_guide_hero.jpg
                                           ) 

## 

Emmy-award winner Micaela Birmingham hosts The NYC Field Guide: How to Thrive in the Five, a 13-episode series that features unique tips, hacks, and expert information for how to live, work, and play in the five boroughs of New York City.

Tune in Wednesdays at 8pm on NYC Life

![Photo of New York City Hall seal](/assets/media/images/content/hero/live_event_seal.jpg)

## [Mayor Eric Adams Holds In-Person Media Availability](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWCiOGH1Juo)

[Streamed live on June 17, 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWCiOGH1Juo)

## [Mayor Eric Adams Holds In-Person Media Availability](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWCiOGH1Juo)

[Streamed live on June 17, 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWCiOGH1Juo)

### NYC Life Specials

**Voces NYC  
Premieres Sunday, July 20th at 12:30 pm, and encores Wednesday, July 30th at 7:30 pm on NYC Life.**  
Audio Description: Hosted by award-winning journalist Jeanine Ramirez, Voces NYC is centered around the lives and careers of prominent Latino New Yorkers. Content Presented in New Partnership with Hispanic Information and Telecommunications Network (HITN), the Largest Spanish-language Public Broadcasting Network in the US.

**PitchBLACK Awards Ceremony 2025**  
Audio Description: Join Black Public Media for the 2025 PitchBLACK Awards Ceremony, a powerful celebration of visionary artists shaping the future of film, television, and immersive media. Held at the Apollo Stages at the Victoria Theater.

### Watch Promos from NYC Media

**That's So Dope, Hip Hop Beyond Music: Promo**  
Audio Description: What began as park-jams in the Bronx, New York City, Hip Hop quickly became a global phenomenon. And this year, we’re celebrating Hip Hop 50, y’all! Hip Hop is much more than just music. It’s a lifestyle and culture onto its own. **That’s So Dope, Hip Hop Beyond Music** spotlights trailblazers who shaped and captured this culture, from B-Boys to bling.

Audio Description: Learn how the NYC Gov channel has become a 24/7 hub for information during the COVID-19 pandemic. Get emergency alerts in real time from NotifyNYC and live updates from the Mayor & City officials about the response to the COVID-19 pandemic. You can also stay up to date on the most current status of the weather, schools, citywide parking, garbage collection, and buses & subways. Available on Channel 25.2 Over the Air, channel 74 on Spectrum and Altice, channel 24 on FiOS, and channel 81 on RCN.

Audio Description: Take a look at some of the best programming that the NYC Life Channel has to offer, such as Neighborhood Slice, Barefeet in NYC, A Day’s Work, Her Big Idea, Native Dish, $9.99 with Dave Evans, Blueprint New York City, Secrets of New York, Catalyst, and That’s So New York. Available on Channel 25.1 Over the Air, channel 22 on Optimum, channel 525 on Verizon FiOS, channel 1025 on Comcast, and channel 25 on Spectrum, DirecTV, and RCN.

NYC Media's FCC Public Files can be accessed here:

[WNYE TV File](https://publicfiles.fcc.gov/tv-profile/wnye-tv ) and [EEO Report](/assets/media/pdf/EEO-Public-File-Report-2022-2023.pdf)  
[WNYE FM File](https://publicfiles.fcc.gov/fm-profile/wnye) and [EEO Report](http://www1.nyc.gov/assets/media/pdf/EEO-Public-File-Report-2022-2023.pdf)  
[Public File Assistance](/site/media/about/contact-us.page )

![NYC Mayor's Office of Media and Entertainment logo graphic.](/assets/media/images/content/content/NYC-Spotlight.jpg)

NYC Media is a division of [**The Mayor's Office of Media and Entertainment**](http://www1.nyc.gov/site/mome/index.page).
